ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Enrich your 'ggplots' with group-wise comparisons. This package provides an easy way to indicate if two groups are significantly different. Commonly this is shown by a bracket on top connecting the groups of interest which itself is annotated with the level of significance (NS, *, **, ***). The package provides a single layer (geom_signif()) that takes the groups for comparison and the test (t.test(), wilcox.text() etc.) as arguments and adds the annotation to the plot.

Enrich your 'ggplots' with group-wise comparisons. This package provides an easy way to indicate if two groups are significantly different. Commonly this is shown by a bracket on top connecting the groups of interest which itself is annotated with the level of significance (NS, *, **, ***). The package provides a single layer (geom_signif()) that takes the groups for comparison and the test (t.test(), wilcox.text() etc.) as arguments and adds the annotation to the plot.

name: r-ggsignif
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggsignif
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: ggsignif_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggsignif_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggsignif/ggsignif_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 112051af425a0c0f2998ce187dacad066bc16f55af01e3e7b76d62ff6954b20a

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 3
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.0.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.0.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggsignif')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggsignif')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/const-ae/ggsignif
  license: GPL-3
  summary: Enrich your 'ggplots' with group-wise comparisons. This package provides an easy way to indicate if two groups are significantly different. Commonly this is shown by a bracket on top connecting the groups of interest which itself is annotated with the level of significance (NS, *, **, ***). The package provides
    a single layer (geom_signif()) that takes the groups for comparison and the test (t.test(), wilcox.text() etc.) as arguments and adds the annotation to the plot.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
